description: City: Midland, TXServing up the best burgers, bbq and hand cut fries. Fountain Drinks and Milkshakes.The Big Red Lunchbox is owned and operated by J.P. Hearn an Le Cordon Bleu trained chef.  The Unit was designed to accommodate a large and diverse menu.  We specialize in food with a “home cooking” flair. Some items we offer:•The New “SpudStick” - We take a whole potato, cut it with our exclusive cutting technology, then fry it up and season.•Bloomin’ Onion - Fried up in a our special batter, served with our special sauces.•Texas Ribeye Sandwich - our version of the venerable Philly Cheesesteak, we make it with Ribeyes, special sauce, caramelized onions and topped with cheese on a bun.•Brisket Sandwiches - Smoked chopped brisket with sauce.•Old fashion Hamburgers - Buttered toasted bun with all the usual toppings and some gourmet options.•Hot Dogs - All Beef Black Angus Sirloin served up with all the trimmings.•Fountain Drinks - Coca Cola, Dr. Pepper, Sprite, Big Red, Barq’s Root Beer.
name: Big Red Lunchbox
